name: autosonglink
title: AutoSongLink
description: Create a multiplatform music link from a Spotify, Apple Music or other share link
author: marvin_l

commands.name: create-music-link
commands.title: Create music link
commands.subtitle: create a multiplatform music link
commands.description: Read the sharing url from your clipboard, and create a multiplatform link

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
